example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانت) (NP-PRD (NOUN لدي) (NP (PRON_3MP هم))) (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM ادلة)) (PP (PREP على) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP كوبا)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM متورطة) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تبادل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN معلومات))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN دولة) (ADJ اخرى))))))))))

arg.g: in exchanging information with another state

example.arg: في تبادل معلومات مع دولة اخرى
